original: Ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā pāpiccho icchāpakato asantaṁ abhūtaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ ullapati,
analyzed: ājīva hetu ājīva kāraṇā pāpicchaḥ icchā apakataḥ asantam abhūtam uttari manussa dhammam ullapati

original: ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā sañcarittaṁ samāpajjati, ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā ‘yo te vihāre

original: vasati, so bhikkhu arahā’ti bhaṇati, ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā bhikkhu paṇītabhojanāni
analyzed: vasati saḥ bhikkhu arahā ati bhaṇati ājīva hetu ājīva kāraṇā bhikkhu paṇīta bhojanāni

original: attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjati, ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā bhikkhunī paṇītabhojanāni
